card.text: Menace Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, create a paradox. — This creature deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of cards in your hand. — Discard your hand, then draw three cards.

card.name: Inverted Wurm
card.text: Trample, haste Whenever another creature enters you may put an inversion counter on that creature. Creatures with inversion counters on them have mana value 6.

card.name: Junkgorging Automaton
card.text: Menace Whenever this creature attacks, you may sacrifice an artifact or creature, when you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Mandelbrot Hydra
card.text: Trample This creature enters with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever you cast a spell with mana value equal to this creatures power, double the number of counters on it.

card.name: Mirageweaver Serpent
Paradox Beast
card.text: Haste When this creature enters, create a paradox (Choose one, the unchosen effect happens at the beginning of your next upkeep.) — This creature gains "When this creature dies, it deals damage equal to its power to any target," — This creature gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Reality Painter
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, exile the top card of your library. You may play face up lands and cast face up creature spells you own from exile.

card.name: Gyrating Baloth
card.text: Trample When this creature enters, gain life equal to the number of other nonland permanents you control.

card.name: Mirage Mirror
card.text: {2}: This artifact becomes a copy of target artifact, creature, enchantment, or land until end of turn.

card.name: The Inversion Zone
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, switch the base power and mana value of each creature you control until end of turn.

card.name: Tesselion
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever a non-token creature you control dies, you may pay 1 life. If you do, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token. At the beginning of your end step, if three or more creatures died this turn, return Tesselion from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Warpshard Phoenix
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever you abstract, you may return this creature from your graveyard to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. (You abtract whenever you create a paradox, or cast a spell from exile.)

card.name: Xalax, Infinite Collector
card.text: Recast— {UB}, Discard two cards. Deathtouch When Xalax enters, look at the top six cards of your library, put one of them into your hand, and the rest on the bottom in a random order.

card.name: Mirror Spire
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {X}: This land becomes a copy of target creature you control until end of turn except it has base power and toughness X and mana value X.

card.name: Crystal Jungle
card.text: Crystal Jungle enters tapped. When Crystal Jungle leaves the battlefield, draw a card. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

card.name: Temporal Forge
card.text: Temporal Forge enters tapped. When Temporal Forge leaves the battlefield, draw a card. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Consortium Haruspex
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, create a paradox, this ability triggers only once each turn (Choose one, the unchosen effect happens at the beginning of your next upkeep.) — Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. — Target creature gains menace until end of turn.

card.name: Change of Perspective
card.text: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. Symmetry 2 — If you control two or more nonland permanents that share a mana value, whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw two cards.

card.name: Counterbalance
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, counter that spell if it has the same mana value as the revealed card.

card.name: Perfect Match
card.text: This creature has mana value 2.

card.name: Sword of Sinew and Steel
Rationalize
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
